sentence.text: Bring up two sides , dampen the edges with a little water and pinch them together to seal .
Dampen the pastry edges , seal together lengthwise and then seal both ends .
Dampen the marzipan with water and position the squares , as shown .
Frankie had scrubbed his hands and feet and dampened his hair with water to make it lie flat and tidy against his head .
As he spoke , he took a kerchief from his pouch , dampened it from the flask and started gently to wipe her face .
As she emerged into the yard fine rain dampened her face .
Very dry plaster , or other high-suction backgrounds should be dampened immediately before fixing the cove .
` If you feed a powder supplement the feed should be dampened , so that if the horse blows through his nose , he does n't blow the powder onto the floor ! "
Dampen the cake drum with water .
While the icing is still soft dampen the ends of the tentacles and press them , one at a time , around the base of the cake .
Instead of immersing the paper in a bath for five to ten minutes as you mention , simply dampen the paper surface on both sides with a sponge .
There I dampened some paper towels and wiped the flour off the goodies I 'd removed from Flaxperson .
Dampen with water and secure to the front of the frog .
Roll out half the white icing to the same shape as the pink , and lightly dampen with water .
